channel.title: Fetch the list of Redash users
channel.description:
Hi there, I need to fetch a list of Redash users with their emails and log-in dates to send some surveys to them. Can you please advise how to do it?
BTW, is it possible to build in some surveys into Redash? For instance, I am interested in Net Promoted Score.

item.title: Fetch the list of Redash users
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Not sure about “net promoted score”. But you can get the user list from the users table or through the api/users endpoint.

Logins can be retrieved from the events table.

Read full topic
item.source: Fetch the list of Redash users
